title: Easy Origami Flower for Beginners: Quick Tutorial

steps.title: Fold your paper in half diagonally, both ways.
steps.content: Fold your paper in half diagonally, both ways. (This step, and the next one, are optional, but it makes the steps afterwards a little bit easier.) [1] X Research source

steps.title: Fold it in half like a card both ways.
steps.content: Fold it in half like a card both ways.

steps.title: Fold all the corners to the middle.
steps.content: Fold all the corners to the middle. (This is where the previous 2 steps help you.)

steps.title: Turn over and repeat.
steps.content: Turn over and repeat. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Fold the paper in half both ways just to give it a little shape.
steps.content: Fold the paper in half both ways just to give it a little shape. Let's call the side you just folded the 'top side' and the side with the two sets of corners folded to the middle the 'bottom side'. Have the top side facing you and the bottom side down. Look at the flaps on the bottom side. Stick your fingers into these and push them all to the middle. (Index and thumb is easiest.)

steps.title: Take your fingers out of it.
steps.content: Take your fingers out of it. You should be looking at something like this. This is a completed fortune teller. The next steps tell you how to turn it into a flower. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Look at the flaps you stick your fingers under.
steps.content: Look at the flaps you stick your fingers under. Fold each one of the points at the bottom on these up to the points at the top.

steps.title: Fold both pieces onto the underside and crease it.
steps.content: Fold both pieces onto the underside and crease it. (At about this time in the folding, a hole may start to form in the middle, which is just from all the wear-and-tear to the paper.)

steps.title: Turn it over and fold the two flaps out a little until you can see four small ones in the center.
steps.content: Turn it over and fold the two flaps out a little until you can see four small ones in the center. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Adjust the small flaps in the middle.
steps.content: Adjust the small flaps in the middle. Fold them back and tuck them under themselves, making a white square appear in the center (make sure you do this well - they come untucked easily.) Turn it over and fold the flaps out to make this - and you're finished! [5] X Research source
